11.title: Pow-Wow Smith
11.author: script, Don Cameron ; pencils, Carmine Infantino
notes: Summary: Smith is a Sioux Indian who is the sheriff of the small western town of Elkhorn, where he is known as a master detective. His proper name is Ohiyesa Smith.
This is the first Pow-Wow Smith story.
Data from Bill Wormstedt, Bob Klein, Mike Tiefenbacher, et al. via Grand Comics Database.

73.title: Pow-Wow Smith
73.author: script, Gardner Fox ; art, Carmine Infantino ; letters, Joe Letterese
notes: Summary: Having been captured once by Pow Wow Smith when his shadow revealed his whereabouts, Ace Wright decides to learn all he can about shadows so he can turn the tables on the Indian Lawman. Included in his studies are knowledge of Shadow Belts to prevent his capture, and magic arrows that will kill a man by striking down his shadow.
Data from Gene Reed, Mike Tiefenbacher, Ed Boner, et al via Grand Comics Database.

89.heading: "Pow! Zap! Spidey Saves Inauguration" / Patricia Montemurri.
89.title: p. 1D, 4D in The Detroit Free Press, January 14, 2009.
89.author: [No author]
notes: An article about the Marvel comic "Amazing Spider-Man #583" which has the action hero saving the inauguration of President-elect Barack Obama. There will be a limited number of books with the president's face on the cover and local stores are preparing to meet the demand.

90.title: The Pow! Zap! Wham! Comic Book Trivia Quiz : 1001 questions & answers
90.author: by Michael Uslan & Bruce Solomon.

publication info.publisher: ill. ; 28 cm. 1. Miscellanea about comics. I. Uslan, Michael

91.heading: Powa.
91.title: "The Amazon Meets the Feminists"
91.author: by Trina
notes: Fifth episode. After seeing what kind of world the feminists want to have equality in, Queen Powa decides to go home to the jungle.

92.heading: Powa.
92.title: "Great Mother"
92.author: by Trina
notes: Third episode. Queen Powa visits civilization, tries to understand attitudes toward nudity, and mistakes a mother with four children for the President of the United States.

93.heading: Powa.
93.title: "We're Feminists"
93.author: by Trina
notes: Fourth episode. Queen Powa is a hit in Washington, and starts a fad of wearing the fur of big cats. Some women crash the ball wanting to talk to her.

94.heading: Powa.
94.title: "Would You Like To Join My Harem?"
94.author: by Trina
notes: Second episode. Queen Powa of the lost Amazon tribe has an invitation for the professor.
